links.title: Did Apple Sell 45 Million iPhones Last Quarter?
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ: AAPL) reports fiscal third-quarter results after markets close Tuesday. The company's third quarter is typically its slowest because iPhone sales have peaked and consumers are waiting for the company to announce new models in (usually) late September.
